net.ognyanov.niogram.analysis

Class FollowKTrace

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ognyanov.niogram.analysis.BaseTrace
      • net.ognyanov.niogram.analysis.FollowKTrace

  • public class FollowKTrace
extends BaseTrace
    A trace for a terminal in the FollowK set of a node.
    Author:
    Nikolay Ognyanov

    • Constructor Detail

      • FollowKTrace

        public FollowKTrace(GrammarNode node,
                    int terminalType,
                    int position)
        Create a new trace. The whole trace is built by the constructor, so it can be used immediately after the object creation.
        Parameters:
        node - the node where the trace starts
        terminalType - the terminal type to be traced
        position - the position at which the terminal type is to be traced
